column4: *blink* Has anyone ever used tinydns under Ubuntu successfully? Some people clearly seem to, and I can't figure out why it seems to be running but not answering...
are you sure that it's not answering...and not that the answer just isn't being received?
since you're choosing between DNS servers I'm going to assume that you're at a certain level of competency and just throw things at you :P
ok, you're correct that it's not a firewall/networking issue
my next best suggestion is...verbose logging on the tinydns end?
no idea, I've never even seen tinydns
